metadata.title: CVE-2023-52656 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: drop any code related to SCM_RIGHTS This is dead code after wedropped support for passing io_uring fds over SCM_RIGHTS, get rid of it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
